html:
Elevate Brands, a US-based company engaged in acquiring and operating Amazon third-party businesses, has secured additional USD55 million in venture funding led by Soroban Capital Partners, LP, with participation from Upper90 and Oaktree Capital Management, L.P.

Elevate Brands will use the funds to accelerate its M&A strategy, expand its sales channels globally, and invest in its technology platform.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)55
Deal TypeVenture Finance
Sub-CategoryGrowth Capital/Expansion
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-11-09

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Elevate Brands
Acquirer 1 (Company)Upper90
Acquirer 2 (Company)Soroban Capital Partners, LP
Acquirer 3 (Company)Oaktree Capital Management, L.P. (New York)
